node.title: 'Anti-mandate is anti-vax': Chief Minister hits out at critics of COVID-19 mandates as NT senator backs One Nation
node.alt: An angry-looking NT Chief Minister Michael Gunner speaking at a press conference at Parliament House.
node.description: Michael Gunner accusesÂ opponents of vaccine mandates of being "anti-vaxxers", even if they have willingly received the COVID-19 jab themselves.
node.content:
["A fiery Northern Territory Chief Minister has accused opponents of vaccine mandates of being \"anti-vaxxers\", even if they have willingly received the COVID-19 jab themselves.", "Michael Gunner's comments at a press conference today are in sharp contrast to the Prime Minister, who has called on state and territory governments to allow Australians to \"move forward with the freedoms that should be theirs\".", "The NT \u2014 which is dealing with a growing coronavirus outbreak \u2014 has one of the country's strictest vaccination mandates, which has helped lift the jurisdiction's double-dose rate to 81 per cent.", "Under the mandate, most workers were required to have had at least one jab by November 12, and a second dose before Christmas.", "Those who fail to adhere to the requirement are not allowed to attend their workplaces.", "The rule has triggered weekly protests in Darwin and prompted criticism from some sections of the business community, who have struggled to replace unvaccinated staff.", "In defence of his policy, Mr Gunner today said the lives of vulnerable Territorians, including Aboriginal people, could only be protected through a broadscale mandate.", "\"If you are anti-mandate, you are absolutely anti-vax,\" he said.", "\"I don't care what your personal vaccination status is.", "Mr Gunner pointed to recent modelling from the Doherty Institute that showed remote communities would remain vulnerable unless vaccination rates among all residents over the age of five reached 80 per cent.", "\"I think you'll see our vaccine mandate is absolutely crucial to protecting life, particularly Aboriginal life,\" he said.", "\"And I will never back away from supporting vaccines and anyone out there who comes for the mandate, you are anti-vax.\"", "Mr Gunner said enforcement, rather than encouragement, was the only way to lift vaccination rates to an adequate level in the NT.", "\"If you say 'pro-persuasion', stuff it, shove it,\" he said.", "\"We are absolutely going to make sure as many Territorians as possible are vaccinated \u2014 that is our best protection against this thing.\"", "It isn't the first time Mr Gunner has labelled anyone raising concerns about the vaccine mandate an anti-vaxxer.", "In September, he used the term to describe his federal Labor party colleague Malarndirri McCarthy as well as his CLP Territory opponents, despite their support for the coronavirus vaccine rollout.", "The CLP opposition supports the NT's COVID-19 vaccine mandate but it has been critical of the way the policy was implemented.", "", "
Senator Sam McMahon says there is no evidence showing\u00a0vaccine mandates drive up\u00a0vaccination.(ABC News: Matt Roberts)
", "The party's representative in the Senate, Sam McMahon, is adamantly opposed to the mandate.", "Today she crossed the floor to vote for a bill, proposed by George Christensen and introduced to the Senate by Pauline Hanson, that would have prevented mandates from being enforced.", "She was joined by four other Coalition senators \u2014\u00a0Gerard Rennick, Alex Antic, Matt Canavan and Concetta Fierravanti-Wells.", "\"So far, we've had no evidence from anywhere that shows that vaccine mandates have increased the vaccination rate, or decreased the spread of COVID,\" she said.", "\"The vast majority of Territorians I speak to have been vaccinated and are happy to be vaccinated, or if they're not happy they're at least willing, but they're opposing the mandate.", "The vote in the Senate was unsuccessful.", "The NT saw an increase in vaccine bookings after the mandate was announced and in the days before it took effect.", "", "
Going overseas? Here's what you need to know
"]
